title: Find the Period
text: For the standard cotangent function $$f(x)=Acot(Bx-C)$$, the period is $$\frac{\pi}{|B|}$$. So $$T=\frac{\pi}{2}=\frac{\pi}{2}$$.

title: Find the Horizontal Shift
text: For the standard cotangent function $$f(x)=Acot(Bx-C)$$, the phase shift is $$\frac{C}{B}$$. So $$h=0$$.
